Sentence: On the day that they meet the Dowells, Leonora sees Maisie Maidan coming out of her (Leonora) husband's bedroom and she (Leonora) assumes they are having an affair
After Florence's nine-year affair with Edward, she (Leonora) plans to divorce Dowell and marry Edward
Through all his (Dowell) affairs, Leonora always hoped that Edward would return to her (Leonora) and love her (Leonora) again
